actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO payments
(created_time,
updated_time,
updated_by,
retailer_code,
payment_type,
transaction_date,
transaction_id,
amount_paid,
payment_mode,
created_by,
payment_received_by,
remarks,
taxable_amt,
gst_amt,
payment_ticket_status,
image_url,
offer_id,
 deleted
)
VALUES 
(now()+'5 hours'::interval + '30 minutes'::interval,
now()+'5 hours'::interval + '30 minutes'::interval,
{{create_created_by.text}},
{{create_retailer_code.selectedOptionValue}},
{{create_payment_type.selectedOptionValue}},
{{create_transaction_date.formattedDate?create_transaction_date.formattedDate:null}},		 
{{create_transaction_id.text}},
{{create_amount_paid.text}},		 
{{create_payment_mode.selectedOptionValue}},			 
{{create_created_by.text}},
{{create_payment_received_by.text}},		
{{create_remarks.text}},
{{create_amount_paid.text}}-{{create_amount_paid.text}}*18/100,
{{create_amount_paid.text}}*18/100,
'OPEN',
 {{create_image_url.files[0].data}},
 {{create_offer_code.selectedOptionValue?create_offer_code.selectedOptionValue:null}},
 false
);
